spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the floor plan layout. Dimensional scaling is highly accurate. Door swings and window placements match the source plan almost perfectly. Low penalty for minor shift in the service room wall alignment.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. All rooms are accounted for, including the foyer and utility areas. Roof removed correctly, dark neutral background present, and zero text/UI clutter observed.

furniture_mapping.notes: Mapping is very clean. Sofa arrangements in the primary and secondary living areas are precise. Kitchen counter configuration and bathroom fixtures match exactly. Minor deduction for simplified desk chairs compared to floor plan icons.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly aesthetic. Flat shading and soft ambient occlusions are used instead of dramatic lighting. Colors are used as descriptors of space rather than realistic textures. Isometric camera is correctly aligned.

detected_errors.description: Minor alignment distortion in the bottom-left service room/toilet area relative to the main kitchen wall.
